name: Gogitum
description:
Small game made in just over 3 hours for #trijam166. It was my first time using Godot for something and I had to Google quite a bit during the 3 hours. I think it turned out alright for a first attempt. The scope creep monster was sitting on my shoulder the whole time and I wanted to add soooo many things. Perhaps I'll do that post-jam.

Update: I totally forgot about the fact that the jam has a theme and I completely missed the mark on that, so I've decided not to submit this for the jam and instead write it up as a learning experience :)

Mission

  • Rescue as many lost spelunkers as you can. Pick them up with your aircraft and bring them back to base.

Controls

  • Move = A/D or LEFT/RIGHT
  • THRUST = W, SPACE or UP
